tier_b.name: Tier B (2-5% Edge)
tier_b.recommendation: Increase minimum threshold to 3-5%, exclude 2-3% range

tier_c.name: Tier C (1-2% Edge)
tier_c.note: Sample size too small for statistical relevance

issues: GSW@OKC Over 237.5: Projected 237.8, actual 225 (blowout game flow not accounted)

top_performers.notes: Highest edge on board, model prediction validated
CRUSHED -8.5 line. Perfect identification of dominant matchup
Bench depth and defensive efficiency projections validated

Lakers exceeded margin projection by 13 points
Blowout game flow caused early scoring halt

tier_a_calibration.description: Tier A picks (5%+ edge) showing 75% win rate vs 55% target
tier_a_calibration.notes: Small sample but strong positive direction

tier_b_calibration.description: Tier B picks (2-5% edge) showing 33.3% win rate vs 52% target
tier_b_calibration.notes: Marginal edges lack sufficient error buffer

markov_chain_validation.description: Markov chain (50K iterations) for player props
markov_chain_validation.interpretation: Model is conservative, actual performance exceeds prediction range
markov_chain_validation.recommendation: Keep current parameters, slight room to increase edge threshold

examples: Pistons beat depleted Lakers (Reaves, Hachimura OUT)

kelly_criterion_analysis.recommendation: Reduce to 2-3% per bet for long-term bankroll safety

model_issues_identified.issue: Under/Over projections failing on blowout games
model_issues_identified.root_cause: Model does not account for early game flow when win probability differential exceeds 60%
model_issues_identified.fix: Implement blowout deflator: Apply -5 to -10 point adjustment to totals

model_issues_identified.root_cause: Thin error margin on 2-3% edges means slight projection error = loss
model_issues_identified.fix: Increase minimum threshold to 3-5%, exclude 2-3% range

model_issues_identified.issue: Only 3/8 spreads within 3 points of actual
model_issues_identified.root_cause: Underestimating team strength variance and matchup dynamics
model_issues_identified.fix: Review spread margin calculation methodology, add matchup adjustments

model_issues_identified.issue: Game-level picks use 10K iterations, lower precision
model_issues_identified.fix: Increase to 20K iterations for improved accuracy

model_issues_identified.issue: Elite defensive teams' pace not factored in totals
model_issues_identified.fix: Add elite defense factor to pace calculator
model_issues_identified.expected_impact: Better totals calibration on non-blowout games

model_strengths: Tier A edge identification (75% hit rate)
Player prop projections (75% accuracy via Markov)
model_weaknesses: Tier B edge picks (33% win rate)

medium_term: Accumulate 30+ more graded bets before major revision (target Jan 20)
Add pace adjustment for elite defenses (Jan 10)
strategic: Scale up player props staking (proven 75% edge)
Consider reducing spread volume pending improvement

summary.primary_insight: Strong performance on high-conviction picks (Tier A at 75%) offset by mid-tier struggles (Tier B at 33%)
summary.overall_assessment: Model is well-calibrated with identified improvement areas. Current performance supports continued operation with planned fixes.
summary.recommended_action: Continue operation while implementing 5 recommended calibration fixes (Jan 5-10). Accumulate additional data before major model revision.
